Title: Relates to providing financial consumer protections for small businesses
Summary: Relates to providing financial consumer protections for small businesses.
LawCode: Add §§5-522 & 5-702-a, Gen Ob L; amd §§173 & 380-e, Bank L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law and the banking law, in relation to providing financial consumer protections for small businesses
